name: Spiff
description: You have the power to Crash Land. As the offense, if both players revealed attack cards and you lost the encounter by 10 or more, you may use this power to land one of your ships that would otherwise be lost to the warp on the targeted planet.
lore: Attacking vicious space monsters at incredible odds comes naturally to the valorous Spiffs. Their cunning and courage have let them save the day even when their doom seemed imminent. Let those who face them beware!

wild.description: As the defense, when you lose an encounter, you may leave one of your ships on the planet instead of sending it to the warp.

super_flare.description: You may use your power to crash land if you lose by a total of 5 or more instead of 10.

retooled_gameplay: Mayfair's Spiff was mandatory. Mayfair's Wild Spiff was significantly different; it allowed a losing offensive ally to place all of his ships on the planet. Mayfair's Super Spiff required a difference in the players' totals of at least 6 rather than 5.
edits: Edited to fix the coexistence bug and Wild Spiff's incorrect prerequisite bar.
